column5: Heading up to South Shore Lodge on Eagle Lake mid August. I know the walleyes will be shallow, deep or somewhere in between but I only have a week to find them. Any tips and locations are welcome. Thanks

They were very deep for mid July (30 to 40 feet) last week when we fished the main basin around Dead Man's, Alcatraz, Coke Bottle, etc. We found the situation much different around Lone Pine, of course, where the water is much more stained and shallower. We caught them off the tops of the humps in 11 to 15 feet there. Dave
